infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: KonKon needs your location to provide localized event recommendations and services.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: KonKon needs access to your camera to take photos and convert them into calendar events.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: KonKon needs access to your photo library to select pictures and convert them into calendar events.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Your microphone is needed to transcribe your voice in real-time and generate chat content. Recordings are processed locally in real-time and are not uploaded or saved.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to improve personalized experiences and ad effectiveness. We are committed to protecting your privacy and will never misuse your data.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: KonKon needs access to your calendar to sync and manage events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: KonKon needs access to your reminders to create reminder notifications.

plugins.calendarPermission: KonKon needs access to your calendar to sync and manage events.
